typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> ActiveFlights
ActiveFlights select(mapColumn(
		AircraftCapacity = Flights[1].AircraftCapacity,
		AncillaryTemplateID = Flights[1].AncillaryTemplateID,
		ArrivalGate = Flights[1].ArrivalGate,
		ArrivalTerminal = Flights[1].ArrivalTerminal,
		BatchCrewMemberMask = Flights[1].BatchCrewMemberMask,
		BatchPassengerMask = Flights[1].BatchPassengerMask,
		BatchPassengerMask = Flights[1].BoardingTime,
		BookedPassengersCount = Flights[1].BookedPassengersCount,
		CancelledBy = Flights[1].CancelledBy,
		CancelledReason = Flights[1].CancelledReason,
		CarrierCode = Flights[1].CarrierCode,
		CrewFlightPostDepartureCloseOutStatus = Flights[1].CrewFlightPostDepartureCloseOutStatus,
		CrewFlightPreDepartureCloseOutStatus = Flights[1].CrewFlightPreDepartureCloseOutStatus,
		ApplicationRecipientID = Flights[1].CrewMemberSecurityRules[1].ApplicationRecipientID,
		CustomerID = Flights[1].CustomerID,
		DepartureGate = Flights[1].DepartureGate,
		DepartureTerminal = Flights[1].DepartureTerminal,
		DestinationAirportCity = Flights[1].DestinationAirportCity,
		DestinationAirportCountryCode = Flights[1].DestinationAirportCountryCode,
		DestinationAirportName = Flights[1].DestinationAirportName,
		DestinationIATA = Flights[1].DestinationIATA,
		DestinationICAO = Flights[1].DestinationICAO,
		EnableBoarding = Flights[1].EnableBoarding,
		EnableCrewAPIS = Flights[1].EnableCrewAPIS,
		EnableDCS = Flights[1].EnableDCS,
		CrewMemberSecurityRules = Flights[1].EnablePassengerAPIS,
		EnableThroughCheckIn = Flights[1].EnableThroughCheckIn,
		EstimatedArrivalTime = Flights[1].EstimatedArrivalTime,
		EstimatedDepartureTime = Flights[1].EstimatedDepartureTime,
		ExternalID = Flights[1].ExternalID,
		FlightDelays = Flights[1].FlightDelays,
		FlightNo = Flights[1].FlightNo,
		HasPassengerSecurityTransactions = Flights[1].HasPassengerSecurityTransactions,
		HealthCheckRuleID = Flights[1].HealthCheckRule.ID,
		Flight_ID = Flights[1].ID,
		IsCancelled = Flights[1].IsCancelled,
		IsOpenSeating = Flights[1].IsOpenSeating,
		IsProgressiveFlight = Flights[1].IsProgressiveFlight,
		MarketingCarrierCode = Flights[1].MarketingCarrierCode,
		MarketingFlightNo = Flights[1].MarketingFlightNo,
		Message = Flights[1].Message,
		OriginAirportCity = Flights[1].OriginAirportCity,
		OriginAirportCountryCode = Flights[1].OriginAirportCountryCode,
		OriginAirportName = Flights[1].OriginAirportName,
		OriginIATA = Flights[1].OriginIATA,
		OriginICAO = Flights[1].OriginICAO,
		ApplicationRecipientID = Flights[1].PassengerSecurityRules[1].ApplicationRecipientID,
		Passengers = Flights[1].Passengers,
		PaxBatchPreVetStatus = Flights[1].PaxBatchPreVetStatus,
		PaxFlightPostDepartureCloseOutStatus = Flights[1].PaxFlightPostDepartureCloseOutStatus,
		PaxFlightPreDepartureCloseOutStatus = Flights[1].PaxFlightPreDepartureCloseOutStatus,
		PnlImported = Flights[1].PnlImported,
		PostDepartureCloseOutCrewMemberMask = Flights[1].PostDepartureCloseOutCrewMemberMask,
		PostDepartureCloseOutPassengerMask = Flights[1].PostDepartureCloseOutPassengerMask,
		PreDepartureCloseOutCrewMemberMask = Flights[1].PreDepartureCloseOutCrewMemberMask,
		PreDepartureCloseOutPassengerMask = Flights[1].PreDepartureCloseOutPassengerMask,
		RemainingFuelLoad = Flights[1].RemainingFuelLoad,
		ScheduledArrivalTime = Flights[1].ScheduledArrivalTime,
		ScheduledDepartureTime = Flights[1].ScheduledDepartureTime,
		ScheduledDepartureTimeUTC = Flights[1].ScheduledDepartureTimeUTC,
		SegmentNo = Flights[1].SegmentNo,
		Status = Flights[1].Status,
		TailNo = Flights[1].TailNo,
		TotalCargoLoad = Flights[1].TotalCargoLoad,
		TotalFuelLoad = Flights[1].TotalFuelLoad,
		Type = Flights[1].Type,
		UpliftFuelLoad = Flights[1].UpliftFuelLoad,
		UseAverageBagWeight = Flights[1].UseAverageBagWeight,
		UseAveragePaxWeight = Flights[1].UseAveragePaxWeight
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
